name: Fullfat
slogan: Full service creative digital marketing agency
description:
We are a full service digital marketing, creative and branding agency based in London and Leeds.

We support startups un growth by bringing to companies our 40 years of combined experience from Apple, Universal Music, Ticketmaster, BBC, MTV and other world recognised companies.

team.title: Founder
team.name: George Sharpe
team.bioHtml: I have 10 years of experience in marketing working for Apple, Universal Music, Live Nation & Ticketmaster.  I specialise in performance marketing & growth.

jobs.title: Facebook ads specialist
jobs.description:
I am looking for a performance marketing specialist who has demonstratable experience in running advertising campaigns across a variety of channels and improve the performance of the campaigns over time.

This means you have worked with channels like Facebook, Adwords, YouTube, LinkedIn, etc and successfully implemented strategies and tactics that have driven ROI and ROAS for eCommerce, Apps, B2b, events and more.

You have the confidence and project management skills to look after multiple projects at one time and can diversify your skillset to make sure you can make a variety of project types perform.

You have the technical skill set to implement pixels and pixel events, set up audiences in GA, maybe you use some tools to help you manage the workflow of managing ads to make sure they perform.

You love digital marketing and you are familiar with marketing across multiple channels and types including social, advertising, email, conversion rate optimisation, website & marketing audits, strategy & tactics.

As the performance marketing manager, you understand the importance of everything that happens after the click so will be well versed in conversion rate optimisation, email marketing strategies and some growth hacks too.

If you have read this far then you will know the password to add in your cover letter is "unicorn". Applications without the password will be automatically rejected. This is important because as performance marketing manager you will have an eagle eye when it comes to attention to detail.

Please tell me from the below which you are great at, good at or need to learn and send demonstrable examples of your understanding.

- Create ads on Facebook, LinkedIn, Snapchat, AdWords, Twitter, Display etc

- Set up complex prospecting & remarketing flows.

- Familiar with finding and testing audiences across channels.

- Familiar with combining tactics across multiple channels

- Demonstratable experience managing ads for eCommerce, Apps or B2b.

- Copywriting for ads, funnel, and emails

- Developing multi-channel strategies and media plans

- ClickFunnels or LeadPages or something similar

- Conversion rate optimisation

- Growth hacking tools & techniques

- Google analytics and other reporting tools

- Creating reports that are insightful and have tangible next steps

- A/B testing methodology

- Slack, Asana or other project management tools

Please also share some examples of the successes you have had in the past. I am not looking for someone who can set up Facebook ads, anyone can set up Facebook ads - I am looking for someone who understands the intrinsic complexities of running campaigns to drive results and the strategies and tactics involved in delivering results - if a campaign doesn't drive results you are quick to react to test, learn, fix or completely rip it up and start again.

You will be working alongside a team of marketing and creative professionals based in London & Leeds, with over 40 years of combined experience coming from the likes of Apple, Universal Music, MTV, BBC, Live Nation and Ticketmaster - joining a collective who are disrupting the way marketing and creative is serviced.

You will be working on music projects, TV projects, mobile app projects, experiential projects both b2b, and b2c.

We believe in creating a culture of performance and trust, you do the work to get the job done, no politics, no corporate bullshittery - just great people, great work and a great balance.
